message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. I'm not at liberty to disclose all the details just yet, but I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000. This is a significant discount from its true potential value. If you're interested in discussing this further, please let me know. Otherwise, I'll be selling it to another buyer for $1500000.
